UniprotID	P15085
Accession	P15085;A4D1M1;Q53XU0;Q9BS67;Q9UCF2
EntryName	CBPA1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Carboxypeptidase A1 (EC 3.4.17.1)
GeneName	CPA1 CPA
Length	419
Function	Carboxypeptidase that catalyzes the release of a C-terminal amino acid, but has little or no action with -Asp, -Glu, -Arg, -Lys or -Pro (PubMed:20385563, PubMed:8806703). Catalyzes the conversion of leukotriene C4 to leukotriene F4 via the hydrolysis of an amide bond (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Secreted
